thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Volleyball Coach - Sports and Fitness

title: Volleyball Coach - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: OTGSI can provide a unique job opportunity - our programs vary in length, allowing our coaches flexibility with scheduling.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
